original_title: Noel Edmonds: The Rise & Fall of Mr Saturday Night
overview: In the 1990s, Noel Edmonds was the undisputed king of Saturday night television. A few years later, he was off the air, bankrupt and suicidal. Taking a deep look at one Britain's most unpredictable, ambitious and mystical television personalities.
tagline: The rise, fall, and come back of the undisputed king of Saturday night television.
title: Noel Edmonds: The Rise & Fall of Mr Saturday Night
